data.introduce: 在线分销航班班期查询服务基于开放技术为代理人提供指定航线的航班时刻表搜索，查询指定日期前后三天的航班时刻表，为代理人在线完成航班时刻表航班班期查询，提供了快捷、简便、高效的途径。
data.business: 根据用户输入的指定航线和时间，查询前后三天的航班时刻表
data.functions: 支持查询指定航线指定时间的前后三天的航班时刻表,对应黑屏中的SK指令。当我们需要了解某一航线上有哪些航班时，可以通过接口查看航班时刻表，其中列出了航班号、行程、时间、机型、经停情况、餐食设定、电子票标志、飞行周期、航班有效期、座位等级的设定。显示内容为指定日期前后三天所涉及的航班班期情况。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirScheduleRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班计划查询请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？：？","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代理人Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"OriginDestinationInformation","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发到达信 息","children":[{"name":"DepartureDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"日期","children":[]},{"name":"DepartureEarlyTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"时间","children":[]},{"name":"OriginLocation","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发地信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达地代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"DestinationLocation","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"到达地信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达地代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FlightInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"飞行计划请求指定的航空公司和航班号","children":[{"name":"FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]},{"name":"Airline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代 码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FlightTypePref","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班类型偏好","children":[{"name":"@DirectOnlyInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"是否限定直 达航班","children":[]},{"name":"@StopOption","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"控制直达, 经停，以及 经停点个数：N：查询经停点为0的航班 D：查询直达航班 C1：查询经停点为1的航班 C2：查询经停点为2的航班 C3：查询经停点为3的航班 C4：查询经停点为4的航班","children":[]},{"name":"@AVoption","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"控制AV返 回情况：H：显示所有的舱位状态 A：按照到达时间排序 P：按照起飞时间排序 E：按照飞行时间排查 O：显示承运方航班信息 D：只显示所有航段都支持电子客票的航线 S：显示星空联盟的航空公司航班信息 T：显示天合联盟的航空公司航班信息 W：显示寰宇一家的航空公司航班信息 A和E不能同时出现，S、T和W不能同时出现。","children":[]},{"name":"@NonStopsOnlyInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"是否限定不 经停航班","children":[]}]}]}]

数","children":[]},{"name":"@ArrivalDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达日期和时间（类型：Date）","children":[]},{"name":"@ArrDateChangeNbr","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达日期变更数","children":[]},{"name":"@StopQuantity","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"经停数","children":[]},{"name":"@ASRInd","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"ASR标识","children":[]},{"name":"@ParticipationLevelCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"连接等级代码","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeshareInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"代码共享标识","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"市场方航班号（例如：1831）","children":[]},{"name":"@Ticket","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票证类型","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketStatus","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票证状态","children":[]},{"name":"@DOW","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"DOW类型","children":[]},{"name":"@MealCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"餐食代码","children":[]},{"name":"@ResBookDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Status","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段行动代码（例如：NN）","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"飞行时间","children":[]},{"name":"@SegmentType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ScheduleValidStartDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"指定计划航班 ty":"1","default":"","description":"查询截至时间","children":[]},{"name":"@OriginDOW","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"DOW类型","children":[]},{"name":"@OriginDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查询起始日期","children":[]},{"name":"@EndDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"查询截止日期","children":[]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息：？","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]}]}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<OTA_AirScheduleRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="PEK099" />
    </POS>
    <OriginDestinationInformation>
        <DepartureDateTime>2022-06-22</DepartureDateTime>
        <DepartureEarlyTime>07:12:13</DepartureEarlyTime>
        <OriginLocation LocationCode="PEK" />
        <DestinationLocation LocationCode="SHA" />
    </OriginDestinationInformation>
    <FlightInfo>
        <Airline Code="CA" />
    </FlightInfo>
    <FlightTypePref StopOption="N" AVoption="H" />
</OTA_AirScheduleRQ>
